sections.1_story: Imagine you are running a small shop and want to know how much money you made or lost after selling goods. Understanding profit and loss helps you make smart business decisions and solve exam questions easily.

5_exam_examples.question: CP=250, SP=300. Find profit and profit%.
CP=400, SP=340. Find loss and loss%.
Find SP to get 25% profit if CP=160.
Find SP to get 10% loss if CP=350.
Find CP if SP=180 and profit%=20%.
Find CP if SP=270 and loss%=10%.
MP=600, Discount=60. Find SP and discount%.
Successive profits of 10% and 20% on CP=100.
